my $carry = 0;
my $result = '';
my $last_digit = '';

for (my $x = 0; $x <= 49; $x++) {
  my $csum = $carry;
  my @nta = ();
  for my $num (@fdns) {
    my $n = substr($num, 49 - $x, 1);
    $csum += int($n);
  }

  
  $last_digit = substr($csum, length($csum) - 1, 1);
  $carry = int($csum/10);
  $result = $last_digit . $result;
  if ($x == 49) {
    $result = $carry . $result;
  }
  
  print "$x) total: $csum, last: $last_digit, carry: $carry\n";
  print '_' x ((49 - length($result)) + 10);
  print $result . "\n";
}
